AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

params._sender: The address of the user who deposited

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params._sender: The address of the user who withdrew

params._amount: The amount of tokens to deposit

params._user: The user to send the XERC20 to

params._amount: The amount of tokens to deposit
params._user: The user to send the XERC20 to

params._erc20: The address of the ERC20 contract
params._isNative: Whether the ERC20 token is the native gas token of this chain or not
params._xerc20: The address of the XERC20 contract

params._amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw
The amount of tokens to withdraw

IXERC20Lockbox_Native().notice: Reverts when a user tries to deposit non-native tokens on a native lockbox

IXERC20Lockbox_NotNative().notice: Reverts when a user tries to deposit native tokens on a non-native lockbox

IXERC20Lockbox_WithdrawFailed().notice: Reverts when a user tries to withdraw and the call fails

Deposit(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when tokens are deposited into the lockbox

Withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when tokens are withdrawn from the lockbox

ERC20().notice: The ERC20 token of this contract

IS_NATIVE().notice: Whether the ERC20 token is the native gas token of this chain

XERC20().notice: The XERC20 token of this contract

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit ERC20 tokens into the lockbox

depositNativeTo(address).notice: Deposit the native asset into the lockbox, and send the XERC20 to a user

depositTo(address,uint256).notice: Deposit ERC20 tokens into the lockbox, and send the XERC20 to a user

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw ERC20 tokens from the lockbox

withdrawTo(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw ERC20 tokens from the lockbox
